Package booklist

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
booklist.Driver
public class Driver extends Object
This is the Driver class of the application. It is an interactive program that allows one to read a file with Book records, identify book records with invalid year and save them into an ArrayList, then into a separate file, store the correct book records in a LinkedList, navigate through the list and change it.
